article_title: Expand healthcare coverage for poor residents
article_text: It has been six years since the Affordable Care Act became the law of the land. Our Florida leaders have remained steadfast in their opposition to extending coverage and access to health care for low-income working Floridians.

Our Florida leaders have remained steadfast in their opposition to extending coverage and access to health care for low-income working Floridians.
It has been six years since the Affordable Care Act became the law of the land.
